item.description:
Rose's Berry Farm serves a wonderful and inexpensive breakfast on Sundays and we go every year. We thought we'd aim for strawberry season this year! The deck where breakfast is served is covered, so we can go rain or shine, but sometimes the farm has to close the breakfast for some reason, so check back here before you leave that morning!

The menu is simple and inexpensive -- pancakes, waffles, or French toast with seasonal toppings.

For more information and directions, go to www.rosesberryfarm.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the line leading to the deck! We'll stand out!
item.name: Breakfast with a View
